First strike
[i]Wo Dao[/i] – Whenever Karla, Sword Mother enters, exile target creature with lesser mana value. Its controller gains life equal to that creatures power.
[i]Vassal's Blade[/i] – Whenever Karla dies, attach any permanents attached to her to another target creature you control.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Karla deals combat damage to a player, forge.
